item.title: Docker Kubernetes and Microservices
item.description: Intro to Docker in 6 minutes How to make a Container Image of your deep learning model application in 8 minutes Introduction to Kubernetes in 10 minutes #kubernetes âœ” Why Kubernetes âœ”Cluster âœ”Control Plane âœ” Nodes âœ”Kube-api server âœ”Controller âœ”Scheduler âœ”etcd âœ”Kube-proxy âœ”Kube-agent âœ” Container Run time âœ”Pods âœ”Deployment âœ”Service - Cluster IP, NodePort and LoadBalancer How to deploy the container image in Kubernetes Local cluster in 9 minutes #kubernetes #containers How to deploy the container image in Kubernetes Local cluster in 9 minutes âœ”ï¸ Create a deployment YAML file âœ”ï¸ Explanation of the different components of a deployment file âœ”ï¸ How the deployment selects the pods âœ”ï¸ Explanation of the pod portion of the YAML file âœ”ï¸ Create a Service YAML file âœ”ï¸ Deploy the Deployment YAML File and Service YAML file âœ”ï¸ Make Intentional mistakes in the YAML file and correct them to solidify our concepts

item.title: Intro to Deep Learning
item.description: This is the course page for the Course Intro to Deep Learning. Please also enroll in Kaggle Learn Intro to Deep Learning course to complete the exercises. Also watch the lectures where we have added our own explanations. Topic Description Video Link 01- single neuron This video introduces the concept of the simplest neural network, the single neuron Single Neuron 01-exercise single neuron This video explains step by step the exercise on the single neuron.
